model

Class RestoredFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • model.RestoredFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>

    public class RestoredFile
extends java.io.File
    Simple data structure without logic to store restored files with some additional information. These additional information are optional and will be added by the AbstractAlgorithm.restore(java.io.File) method. They will be displayed to the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
